comment: pretty ez class just weekly lectures & ez assignments, very clear instructions and tests were also quite ez. he also has modules for advising which i think were v informative and helped me with my future. overall would def take again, just watch the lectures in 2x maybe

Great professor. Took GEOG1130 4 week summer course. Fairly easy. No lockdown browser. Just 5 lecture vids and a quiz every week. 1 assignment towards the end of the course and 1 final exam over the last unit. Easy A class if you need to boost your GPA. I would def recommend the professor ;)

Professor Matt Waller, class this semester was amazing. He is a very kind, thoughtful, and patient professor. If you communicate with him through email about assignments, test, and your daily life obligations he will work with you I assure you. He is by for one of the best advocates of assisting students of all walks of life to become successful.

*NOTE: I ACTUALLY TOOK GEOG 1130, BUT THAT WAS NOT AN OPTION ON HERE* Prof. Waller is one of the best professors I've had at KSU. His class is not hard at all, and he's super nice. His lectures are also very engaging. TAKE PROFESSOR WALLER!!! Seriously, you won't regret it!

Professor Waller was one of the few teachers I wish I could take for all of my classes. Extremely caring and understanding of any problems one runs into while in school. Honestly, I was thinking about dropping out of school until I took professor Waller, the first A I've had since freshman year of college. If he is an option, get in his class.

I took this course as my first introduce GEOG 1101 course and it was wonderful. He really works with students, but as long as you read the textbook, attend class, and receive the help you will get an A. There are quizzes, one group project it's so easy, and that's it. He was one of my best professors freshman years!
Great guy and teacher. Teaching may be hard but he makes class fun

Professor Waller is nice and helpful. He goes out of his way sometimes to help and is there for you. His lectures are interesting. His research paper was shortened to 5 pages which is awesome! Good teacher and class!

Professor Waller is incredible!  Really passionate about the subject and unbelievably nice, too.  His tests are challenging, but if you come to class, pay attention, and take thorough notes, you'll do well.  I highly recommend this class!  Great guy.

AMAZING PROFESSOR! Get his class if you can! He is energetic, makes class interesting, and obviously loves teaching. He doesn't take attendance, and he corrects full study guides people post online before exams.

PROFESSOR WALLER IS WONDERFUL!!! He is so clear and helpful and gives you the tools to do really well. His study guides are perfect and assignments are fairly easy. He makes class interesting and is always there for you if you need help. The best professor I have had! If you don't make an A in his class it's totally your own fault!

Prof. Waller is AWESOME. Very nice and very easy. Made it easy to come to class. Gave study guides and outlines of lectures. If you go to class you will get an A, I have gotten 100s on everything. DEFINITELY TAKE HIM!!

I LOVE PROFESSOR WALLER!!! His class is not hard, not boring, very informative & interesting. Outlines of the power points are on vista & the class website. Attendance is not mandatory. There are four tests and two homework assignments. Test questions come directly from the study guide. Very easy A

professor Waller was very organized, and specific. His Vista layout was easy to navigate, and his test were lengthly but really easy. This class is a definite A just as long as you attend the lecture and take notes. In most instances I only studied the maps since all other material was overed in class

He's very organized and his outlines are on vista. Also, his study guides are online and they follow the notes. He's always willing to help and answers questions on vista a well as in class. He does talk fast, but if you miss anything you can always ask him after class or on vista. Does not take attendance cause class was big! (Over 200).

I took him online for GEOG 1101. Glad I did! Very organized, follows the syllabus exactly, doesn't grade harshly, assignments were easy, no exams. If you want an easygoing class and professor, take him.

Professor Waller is a great professor, he knows his subject matter and works hard to make it interesting. He also makes the topics applicable by relating interesting (if not somewhat long) personal examples of the different regions.

I love Mr. Waller! He is funny and makes notes interesting as they can be. His notes are very organized and he posts the power points online. Show up, take notes, study the STUDY GUIDE (yes!) you'll make an A. I've never opened the text book. I took him for GEOG 1101 and so I took him again! Also, I want to call out whoever wrote that last comment.

He's so nice it's hard to criticize him, but he is pretty lazy when it comes to teaching. He only teaches about 1/4 of the information and the rest is posted online for you to go through on your own. For the self-motivated learner, he's great; but if you're dependent on the prof to teach it all in class, don't take him.

Mr. Waller is an excellent professor. His teaching methods are clear and well organized. Easy to understand. You do need to attend every class, take lots of notes and visit the class website for information. He gives you everthing you need to succeed and makes the subject matter interesting! I learned a lot!

Awesome Professor. He keeps his lectures very interesting, knows his topic inside and out, and is extremely prepared each and every class. He will help if you need it, but everything you need is posted online including powerpoints, notes, maps, reference materials, ect.. This guy works hard to make lectures clear and enjoyable.

Test: Easy as long as you study the SG. Questions straight from it. Study Guide: most answers straight from notes & has a review day for questions. Attendance: Not mandatory and basic notes/outline online. Just do the assignments and study the study guide and you make a B at least. Book is like $5 on amazon bc he wants old edition. No need to buy.

I LOVED Mr. Waller's class! Just show up to every class, do the assignments, take notes everyday and you'll definitely get an A in the class. He is very funny and gives study guides out prior to the test that are in order of the notes. I didn't buy the textbook, but still made an A - thats at your own choice though. I wish I could take him again!!!

Great professor! He explains the material clearly and follows the syllabus so you know what is happening in class. He is funny and his assignments are easy! I wish all KSU professors were like Mr. Waller!

Super nice! Understanding and very helpful. I took World Geography and Sub-Saharan Geography with him, and both classes were awesome! Material is straight forward and he knows it well. He even lived in Tanzania for a few years! If you get the chance to take him, DO IT! You'll be glad you did.

I'm going to be honest... this teacher was incredibly nice, understanding, and amusing... but I often couldn't stay awake in his class. I think it's because his voice is soothing? I advise everyone to take this course - it's important information to be knowledgeable about. Just be sure to get plenty of sleep before.

All you have to do to get a good grade is show up to class and take good notes.  It doesn't hurt to read the textbook either since all his test questions are in the book.  Overall he's a really good professor.

Firstly, let me just say I LOVE MR.WALLER. He is an amazing prof. Very organized, helpful, knowledgeable, enthusiastic, etc. etc. etc. If you pass up an opportunity to take him, your missing out. Go to class, take notes, do the study guides, study = A+ and great learning experience! Promise!

Mr. Waller truly cares about teaching and it shows.  He is a citizen of the world.  A teacher without borders!  He is perfect for geography.  I enjoyed this class so much that I may change my major to geography.  Take Mr. Waller and any class that he teaches.  You will be better for it.

Easy A+! Enthusiastic teacher!! Go to class, take notes, fill out study guide (90% or more of test questions), he interacts on discussion board to answer incorrect or missing info. He totally cares about our success, and made this class one I looked forward to attending every week! Book? I did use it, but would have been fine without the it.

Easy A+! Enthusiastic teacher!! Go to class, take notes, fill out study guide (90% or more of test questions), he interacts on discussion board to answer incorrect or missing info. He totally cares about our success, and made this class one I looked forward to attending every week! Book? I did use it, but would have been fine without the it.

Do yourself a favor. If you can take any class this professor has DO IT! Show up, take notes, prepare the study guide he provides and you're set! His lectures are always engaging and he totally cares about his students. I'd jump at the chance to take another class from Prof Waller! Easily my best professor here at KSU so far.

Such and AWESOME teacher. He makes everything so clear. If you need help he's willing to talk to you. All you have to do is take notes and listen. I got a high B but only cuz i slacked off on the final. His class is straight forward. And you have a lot of assignments so you get a chance to pull up your grade. Take Him!!! i didnt buy the book.

He is a real nice guy... class is pretty boring. Honestly if you just buy the book and do the study guide you will make an A. I actually did better on the tests not going to class. Overall, easy class.

waller is a fantastic teacher. hes really in tune with world geography, and unlike some teachers actually knows what he is talking about. I dont leave class without atleast laughing once! plus he gives out study guides for the tests. would love to have another class with him!
wallers the best!!!!! easy tests, funny class, nice easy going teacher. highly reccomend. you just have to study before tests

awesome teacher! He is very nice, and humorous. sometimes shows funny youtube videos partaining to what we are learning. Extremely easy class as long as you study two or three days prior to test, its alot of material to cover. Tests are easy and straight-forward, only hw is two online assignments, easy 100s. i dont try that hard and have a 450/444.
Took his course online. very quick and very simple assignments, such as chapter quizzes and current event discussions. Overall easy course instructions and expectations.
great teacher. passionate about teaching geography. definately knows ALOT about it. gives study guides for every test just need to read textbook and would reccomend going to class!

Amazing professor!! Gives the notes in class and a study guide for the test. Know the study guide and attend class most of the time and there is no reason to not make an A in this class. 4 tests and 2 assignments that take all of an hour to complete make up the grades in this class.
HILARIOUS! One of the coolest teachers. 4 tests, none are comprehensive., and the fianl is the 4th test. Come to class, take notes, easy A.

This guy is legit. The material isn't very interesting, but he cracks occasional jokes. The tests are straight from the study guide, but it is a LOT of information. Just make sure you study a lot for the tests and you will be fine. Easy B, very obtainable A. 2 assignments which are very easy and you never have to go to class. Take Waller!

Knowledgeable and helpful prof! Note outlines posted online before class, extremely helpful for note taking. If you fill in around them you will ace the tests. 4 tests, no midterm or final, choose 2 of 3 easy assignments. Study guides given before test, outline 95% of what's on the test. Highly recommend!
So boring. You have to go to class so you can get the notes.

4 tests, 2 assignments.  Mr. Waller is very knowledgeable and interesting to listen to.  Should be an easy A if you take good notes.  Provides study guides that pretty much cover the tests.  If you are gonna take this class, Mr. Waller is the professor you want.

Mr. Waller is an excellent teacher. Going to class is helpful, but not crucial. He posts the notes online, but he doesn't put everything you need to know for the test online. The textbook was extremely helpful for me and with his help, I found it online for only $25. You can't beat that. If you need to take geog 1101, take his class.

Mr.Waller is very easy. You must go to class and take notes on his lecture but all the tests come from study giudes he gives and all the answers to the study guide come from class notes. He will help you in any way he can,Its an easy class IF YOU GO!

Easy A, especially if you go to class. Powerpoints are posted on Vista and if you review them before tests you can make an A. I would go to class though bc he'll sneak in some questions on the test from class. Attendance is not mandatory though & I rarely used my text book...so if you have a friend just share.

I'll be perfectly honest... this is an exceptionally boring class to me.  I dislike Geography in general.  Mr Waller has an interesting presentation style - powerpoints mostly, in which selected parts are not included.  I'm headed into the final and only need a 62 to keep an A in the class.
Very nice man. Very knowledgable. Easy class. Highly recommended.

I only went to class on the 4 test days and got an A on every test (your grade is composed solely of the test grades). He posts all the study guides, short answers, and notes online. all answers for the study guide are in notes. I never once opened the book, so don't buy it!!!!!

A very nice gentleman. Very helpful, polite, and nice person. His class is very interesting and he has all the notes online. He posts the study guides (basically the test) and the essays. I really enjoyed his class and would definitely recommend him to anyone!! Make sure you take him!!
Easy class, I haven't been there over a month and I only show up for tests. Study guides are online and so are notes.

Nice guy. Pretty helpful and very easy. Too much extra credit to describe. Knows his stuff. All tests are 50 questions plus like 5 map questions and then like an extra 40 points of extra credit. TAKE HIM.

Very, very nice. I had him for GEOG1101, and he's so lenient. You have a group project and a few tests and that's it. He puts his powerpoints on webct vista, so though I recommend going to class you certainly don't need to. Very helpful. Reading the text helps but I never really did :P RECOMMEND!
